title: BG3 Classes Complete Guide

content:
other spellcasting classes.

Wizard: While spellcasting can be complex, the Wizard class provides a wide range of magical options. Their spellbook system allows for spell customization, and they can specialize in different schools of magic to suit different playstyles.

Ranger: Rangers are skilled in both ranged and melee combat, and they have a connection to nature that offers unique abilities. They can summon animals to aid them in battle, which can be helpful for beginners seeking additional
